page.title: 08NEIGHBOURHOOD CENTER
page.content: The Neighbourhood Centre at Blackbird Leys is a good example of how people in a community can help each other. It is staffed by voluntary workers and is open five days a week There have been several organised group activities suitable for different age groups. The Centre is also used as an advice centre helping with a variety of social problems. There is also a coffee bar where people can meet socially during the day. The Centre does have staffing problems. It is difficult to get help on a regular basis and volunteers all have to be trained. One of the workers said that it was annoying to think that people experiencing difficulties arising from unemployment were not getting all they were entitled to. She found it a very satisfying, worthwhile job.
